channel.title: [317]Changing Modern/Ancient/Lunar Teleports?[317]
channel.description:
Client = Fubergen Source = EmpireScape
alright, so i want to change where the home teleport under modern, ancient and lunar teleports take me...right now it takes me to a shops place, i want it to take me to varrok, my home place..where would i change it? i looked in my client.java and couldn't find anything..any ideas?
Thanks! :confused:

item.title: [317]Changing Modern/Ancient/Lunar Teleports?[317]
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“GrimReapersScythe, post:4, topic:285588”]This is in clickingmost.java, search for “case 4140” and under that should be “50235” then it will say
"c.triggerTele(2540+misc.random(3), 3891+misc.random(3), 0);
Change the 2540, to any X coordinate at your home, and the 3891, to any Y coordinate at your home.
It will be like actual RuneScape’s teleports where you appear in different spots.

-Grim.[/quote]
Maybe if you did it like this he would understand it bether:

Teleport to the area you want to change and when you are there use
::mypos It will now show your position.

Open up Clickingmost.java and search numbers of your coord.
You will find a case and see 2 coords same as you used ::mypos.
Change the coords to the coords of the place you want it for the teleport and your done.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing Modern/Ancient/Lunar Teleports?[317]
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

This is in clickingmost.java, search for “case 4140” and under that should be “50235” then it will say
"c.triggerTele(2540+misc.random(3), 3891+misc.random(3), 0);
Change the 2540, to any X coordinate at your home, and the 3891, to any Y coordinate at your home.
It will be like actual RuneScape’s teleports where you appear in different spots.

-Grim.

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing Modern/Ancient/Lunar Teleports?[317]
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

But what if the teleport uses multiple coords? With 1 centimeter south or something… should I edit the causes? if yes, how?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Changing Modern/Ancient/Lunar Teleports?[317]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

if you get the coords of were you teleport to in your shops then you can take the first teleport code most likey the X coord and then search in your client.java or clickingmost.java and then match the Y coord with the X coord in the code and then bam there you go you can change it to what you what

Read full topic
